entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:52 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 7:52 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
